title: Pixel Watch leaker reveals more details about Google’s upcoming smartwatch
content:
The person who recently shared live images of the upcoming Google Pixel Watch has revealed some additional details about the smartwatch. In a recent post on Reddit, they have confirmed that one of their friends found the Pixel Watch prototype a few weeks ago at a restaurant in the northwest suburbs of Chicago. But they held

The post Pixel Watch leaker reveals more details about Google’s upcoming smartwatch appeared first on XDA.
description: The person who recently shared live images of the Pixel Watch has revealed some additional details about the device. Read on to learn more.
